department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: NAFC Flooring Replacement \\u2013 St. John\\u2019s, NL
description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time All bid submissions must be submitted on 13 December, 2022 by 1400 EST\u2029/Public \\u2023\\u202fServices and Procurement Canada PSPC has a requirement for Flooring Replacement at the Northwest Atlantic Fisheries Center in St\\u2019s, Newfoundlan Sidduisland \\u2023\\u202fBackground\\u2023\\u202fThe scope of work for this project consists of the furnishing of all plant, labour, equipment and material required for the replacement of ceramic, resilient, and carpet tile flooring types at various locations throughout the NAFC in St\\u2019s, NL\\u2020 Delivery Date Required:\\u2029 (18) weeks after award of contract Bid Security will be a requirement for this tender during Phase Two.\u202f
